frontmatter.title: Gatsby with Tailwind CSS
frontmatter.staticPreview: When creating the site for Fluency, I figured now was as good a time as any to try out Tailwind CSS. Like all static sites I build nowadays, the site runs on Gatsby, but wnfortunately the docs on how to integrate Tailwind with Gatsby are quite complicated...
frontmatter.mdxPreview: When creating the site for [Fluency](https://getfluency.io), I figured now was as good a time as any to try out [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/). Like all static sites I build nowadays, the site runs on [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/), but wnfortunately the [docs](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/tailwind-css/) on how to integrate Tailwind with Gatsby are quite complicated...
